choices.choiceText: Create a draft and work on the Lead before submission

choices.name: Submit

Flow.description: GTMS-21453: Updated as part of Partner Alignment project to remove the draft and Submit Deal Registration screen GTMS-25123: Removed Reseller View managed Package related fields from the flow for the package installation. fields.helpText:
Front & dual-facing AI-enabled dash cameras with driver safety and coaching

https://www.samsara.com/products/safety/

fields.name: AssetGatewaysInput
fields.helpText:
Manage trailers, reefers, unpowered and heavy equipment with tools like real-time GPS, geofences, asset scheduling, and time-on-site reports

https://www.samsara.com/products/equipment-monitoring/

fields.name: IndustrialGatewaysInput

https://www.samsara.com/products/equipment-monitoring/advanced-monitoring

fields.name: displayurl
fields.fieldText: Need a refresher? Click here to review Samsara's expectations regarding on BANT qualifications and Influence contributions. Deal Reg without proper BANT qualification will be denied.

fields.name: MoreAboutOpportunityInput
fields.fieldText: Please add BANT Qualifications and anticipated influence contributions here.

screens.description: Error page for when a user enters something incorrect into the Deal Registration form.
screens.name: Error
screens.label: Something Wen't Wrong

fields.name: ErrorLabel
fields.fieldText:
Please ensure the following fields are completed and try again:

  • Country
  • State/Province

fields.name: StateErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: Please enter a country and state (state optional outside of US)

textTemplates.name: influenceDetailsTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Eligibility for payment on opportunities your influence is based on demonstrating at least 2 of 4 deal engagement criteria:

  • Provided key insight about the customer or deal
  • Recommended Samsara to customer over competitors
  • Significant investment in sales cycle (examples: provided customer references, created proposal materials, participated in phone calls or meetings)
  • Provide an SVP+ introduction at customer

Please indicate how you will be involved with this customer.
